revised_title: Kew Observatory Annual Report and Magnetic Storms
tldr: The Kew Committee's annual report discusses the operations and findings at the Kew Observatory in Richmond, Surrey. They recorded a significant magnetic storm from August 11th to 15th and compared their magnetograph curves with other global observatories. The report also covers meteorological observations, instrument maintenance, and solar observations, including a complete catalog of solar photographs taken at Kew from 1862 to 1872.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Meteorology and Climate Science
